TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider

summary.span: 使用忽略字符串大小写的哈希算法，为对象提供哈希代码。

span.span: Supplies a hash code for an object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口一样支持字符串，不区分大小写比较实现可支持不区分大小写的比较在字符串上的接口。 implements the interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as implements the interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings. 用作键，即可通过对象需重写方法 (或接口) 和方法 (或接口)。The objects used as keys by a are required to override the method (or the interface) and the method (or the interface). 方法或接口的实现必须处理区分大小写相同的方式;否则为可能出现错误的行为。The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the might behave incorrectly. 例如，在创建，你必须使用与此类类或任何不区分大小写实现。For example, when creating a , you must use this class with the class or any case-insensitive implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个区分大小写的哈希表和不区分大小写的哈希表，并演示其行为中的差异，即使它们都包含相同的元素。The following code example creates a case-sensitive hash table and a case-insensitive hash table and demonstrates the difference in their behavior, even if both contain the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CPP/caseinsensitive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CS/caseinsensitive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/VB/caseinsensitive.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用当前线程的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the of the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用此构造函数，创建实例保存当前线程。When the instance is created using this constructor, the of the current thread is saved. 比较过程使用的已保存的区域性来确定的大小写规则;因此，哈希代码比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个区分大小写的哈希表和不区分大小写的哈希表，并演示其行为中的差异，即使它们都包含相同的元素。The following code example creates a case-sensitive hash table and a case-insensitive hash table and demonstrates the difference in their behavior, even if both contain the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CPP/caseinsensitive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CS/caseinsensitive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/VB/caseinsensitive.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的比较过程来确定的大小写规则。Comparison procedures use the specified to determine the casing rules. 哈希代码比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。Hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个区分大小写的哈希表和不区分大小写的哈希表，并演示其行为中的差异，即使它们都包含相同的元素。The following code example creates a case-sensitive hash table and a case-insensitive hash table and demonstrates the difference in their behavior, even if both contain the same elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用无参数构造函数，创建实例保存当前线程。When the instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the of the current thread is saved. 比较过程使用的已保存的区域性来确定的大小写规则;因此，哈希代码比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetHashCode(object obj) cil managed
Public Function GetHashCode (obj As Object) As Integer

span.span: The for which a hash code is to be returned.

summary.span: 使用忽略字符串大小写的哈希算法返回给定对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns a hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.

returns.span: 给定对象的哈希代码（使用忽略字符串大小写的哈希算法返回）。

span.span: A hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两个原因，决不持久此方法的返回值。The return value from this method must not be persisted for two reasons. 首先，可能会更改类的哈希函数以生成更好的分布，从而使旧的哈希函数中的任何值都无用。First, the hash function of a class might be altered to generate a better distribution, thereby rendering any values from the old hash function useless. 其次，此类的默认实现不保证，将由不同的实例返回相同的值。Second, the default implementation of this class does not guarantee that the same value will be returned by different instances.
